players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I saw Charlie last night and he was alive. I have no idea what happened to him."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found out he is the mafioso. Alice saw Charlie last night and he was alive, so she couldn't have killed him. We need to figure out who did."
Bob: "I saw Charlie last night and he was alive. I didn't kill him, so it must have been the mafioso or the detective."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
